â€¢ Vitamin D. Vitamin D is 
available to buy from your 
pharmacy or supermarket. 
All pregnant women should 
take a 10 microgram 
supplement of vitamin D 
during autumn and winter 
months as sunlight is not 
strong enough to make 
vitamin D during this time 
(October to the end of 
March). You need vitamin D 
to keep your bones healthy 
and to provide your baby 
with enough vitamin D for 
the	first	few	months	of	their	
life. Vitamin D regulates
